slide.title: PerishAI: Smart Shelf-Life Aware Routing for Perishable Goods
Problem & Motivation
slide.content: - Perishable goods often spoil before delivery, causing waste and financial loss. - Need for intelligent routing to maximize freshness and minimize waste.

slide.title: Solution Overview
slide.content: - AI/ML-powered pipeline for shelf-life prediction and route optimization. - End-to-end workflow: data simulation, modeling, prediction, optimization, and visualization.

slide.title: Data Simulation Process
slide.content: - Simulates realistic delivery data with units in all columns. - Features: product_type, time_in_transit (hours), temperature_exposure (°C), humidity (%), storage_conditions, shelf_life_left (days).

slide.title: Shelf-Life Prediction Model
slide.content: - XGBoost regression model. - Preprocessing: one-hot encoding, scaling. - Predicts remaining shelf life for each delivery.

slide.title: Route Optimization Approach
slide.content: - Rule-based: sort deliveries by predicted shelf life (ascending). - Ensures products closest to expiry are delivered first.

slide.title: Dashboard Demo
slide.content: - Streamlit dashboard shows: - Optimized delivery plan - Product freshness tracker - Sustainability metrics (waste avoided, CO₂ saved)

slide.title: Results & Impact
slide.content: - Improved delivery efficiency and reduced waste. - Data-driven insights for supply chain optimization.

slide.title: Future Work
slide.content: - Integrate real-time data feeds. - Advanced optimization algorithms. - Broader sustainability metrics.
